resources.string: Allows the app to get your approximate location. This location is derived by location services using network location sources such as cell towers and WLAN. These location services must be turned on and available to your device for the app to use them. Apps may use this to determine approximately where you are.
Allows the app to view information about WLAN networking, such as whether WLAN is enabled and name of connected WLAN devices.
Allows the app to connect to and disconnect from WLAN access points and to make changes to device configuration for WLAN networks.
Allows the app to receive packets sent to all devices on a WLAN network using multicast addresses, not just your phone. It uses more power than the non-multicast mode.
Start WLAN Direct. This will turn off WLAN client/hotspot.
"Youâ€™ve accessed CT WLAN network. Please contact 10000 or local CT store for billing info. Please disconnect while not in use. "
"You will be connected to China Telecom's WLAN network. For details of the charges, please contact China Telecom customer service. Proceed?"
Start WLAN client. This will disconnect WLAN Direct.
This will disconnect any existing WLAN connection
Start WLAN Direct. This will disconnect WLAN connection.
